column4: Hello. I am installing Ubuntu 8.04 on my notebook (Toshiba Satellite L350. During the installation it says that no network card has been detected and that I should install a driver. I try to install from the alternate cd. When I look with lspci it says that it found a RTL8101e network card. What should I do?
Ubuntu Alternate does on online automatic network configuration. Alternate must be installed with a live internet conection.
if hardware is not detected then Ubuntu is not suitable.
the Linux community has info on successful laptop installs. Consult Google.
